[F]or any of the people who were sort of

[F]it was really people here and there.

[F]There was Robert Warshaw

[F]with this book published in 1951.

[F]So, as with cultural studies,
he also, of course

[F]is a hugely foundational figure

[F]he has been studied as a theorist

[F] I guess it's a discipline --

[F]this McLuhan that I'm saying

[F]has been taken care of, and

[F]is the [F]theorist.

[F]how little has been done on
the material aspects of his practice.

[F]"the medium is the message."

[F]"I have percepts, not concepts."
